long_description:
# ExTextures
__Extextures__ aims to improve ***minetest_game***'s default textures while keeping a familiar feel.

Current retextures include:

- Default:
- - Wood Planks
- - Ore in stone
- - Clay, Coal and Ore lumps
- - Metal blocks
- - Apple
- - Ingots
- Map
- Buckets (Improved bucket texture and made fluid colors more consistent with water colors)
- Technic
- - Metal Blocks and Ingots (Incomplete)
- Bones
- TNT
- Moreores
- - Made ores consistent with new ingot/block style
- Thirsty Canteens
name: extextures
title: ExTextures
